name: Fairy Lands: Rinka and the Fairy Gems
description: Weird gems are falling from the skies! Who will manage to do something about it? Maybe Rinka? Well, Wiseghaika surely hopes that somebody will do something.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 60 MB available space
